means: 争吵，辩论( argue的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: He argues strongly for retention of NATO as a guarantee of peace.
sentence.Network_cn: 他强烈要求保留北大西洋公约组织以维护和平。

sentence.Network_en: He argues that he is the true candidate of change.
sentence.Network_cn: 他争辩说他才是真正能带来变革的候选人。

sentence.Network_en: The report argues against tax increases.
sentence.Network_cn: 报告提出理由反对提高税率。

PerfectNetExp.abs: clearly , this argues strongly for more stringent surveillance on both sides of the fence .显然，这一点证明我们需要加强对放款和借款两方面的监管。

that argues for raising interest rates . at the same time , because of the credit and housing crisis , America is close to a recession and other economies look set for a fall .这为这些央行提高利率提供了依据，与此同时，因为次贷危机，美国经济频临衰退，同时其他经济体经济有所降温。
the administration argues a committee might be too slow to act ., 政府则认为委员会的行动可能过于迟缓.
it argues that the climate differences of the south north laid out the basic condition for the physical and geographic diversity of these two parts .淮河南北气候的不同，奠定了南北差异的自然地理基础。

list.abs: 备考资料：高考高频动词短语（4）_新东方在线 ... 48.make a promise 许诺； 49.argue about sth 议论； 50.take one’s seat 就做；.
Go for it八年级下的词汇整理_百度知道 ... the same as… 与……同样的 argue with… 与……争论 borrow from… 向……借.
金钱鱼（学名：Scatophagus argus）为辐鳍鱼纲鲈形目刺尾鱼亚目金钱鱼科的其中一种，俗名金鼓。来自“http://zh.wikipedia.org/w/in…
乌鳢（Channa argus）属鲈形目，攀鲈亚目，鳢科，鳢属。俗称：黑鱼、才鱼、乌鱼、乌棒、蛇头鱼、生鱼。

entry.def: If one person argues with another, they speak angrily to each other about something that they disagree about. You can also say that two people argue .

example.ex: The committee is concerned about players' behaviour, especially arguing with referees...
example.tran: 委员会很关注运动员的行为，特别是与裁判争吵的行为。

example.ex: They were still arguing; I could hear them down the road.
example.tran: 他们还在争吵；我在马路的那头都能听见他们的声音。

entry.def: If you tell someone not to argue with you, you want them to do or believe what you say without protest or disagreement.

example.ex: The children go to bed at 10.30. No one dares argue.
example.tran: 孩子们10点半上床睡觉。没有人敢说不。

entry.def: If you argue with someone about something, you discuss it with them, with each of you giving your different opinions.

example.ex: He was arguing with the King about the need to maintain the cavalry at full strength...
example.tran: 他正和国王讨论保留骑兵全部力量的必要性。

example.ex: They are arguing over foreign policy...
example.tran: 他们正就外交政策进行讨论。

entry.def: If you argue that something is true, you state it and give the reasons why you think it is true.

example.ex: His lawyers are arguing that he is unfit to stand trial...
example.tran: 他的律师正在提出理由说明他不适合出庭受审。

example.ex: It could be argued that the British are not aggressive enough.
example.tran: 可以说英国人不够强势。

entry.def: If you argue for something, you say why you agree with it, in order to persuade people that it is right. If you argue against something, you say why you disagree with it, in order to persuade people that it is wrong.

example.ex: The report argues against tax increases...
example.tran: 报告提出理由反对提高税率。

example.ex: I argued the case for an independent central bank.
example.tran: 我支持设立独立的中央银行。

entry.def: If you argue, you support your opinions with evidence in an ordered or logical way.

example.ex: I've argued deductively from the text...
example.tran: 我已依文字作过推理论证。

example.ex: He argued persuasively, and was full of confidence.
example.tran: 他的论证很有说服力，且充满自信。

entry.def: If you say that no-one can argue with a particular fact or opinion, you are emphasizing that it is obviously true and so everyone must accept it.

example.ex: We produced the best soccer of the tournament. Nobody would argue with that.
example.tran: 本届比赛中我们踢出了最漂亮的足球，谁都不会否认这一点。

auth_sentence.content: Yet it is also an investment, he argues.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet it is also an investment, he argues.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet it is also an investment, he argues.

auth_sentence.content: Leroy vigorously argues that bats should not be culled.
auth_sentence.res_content: Leroy vigorously argues that bats should not be culled.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Leroy vigorously argues that bats should not be culled.

auth_sentence.content: The government argues it does not have a choice.
auth_sentence.res_content: The government argues it does not have a choice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The government argues it does not have a choice.

Sentence.sentence: If you believe that you have found true romance, and your culture tells you that this is what a long-term relationship should be based on, there is less need to rely on social or family pressures to keep couples together, O'Sullivan argues.
Milkman, the sociologist, argues that American craftsmanship isn't disappearing as quickly as some would argue - that it has instead shifted to immigrants.
The author argues that the rising carbon levels in rain forests may turn them into a major source of greenhouse gases
Monsanto argues that its patents extend to later generations.
